column4: thanks dhanar10, but there doesn't seem to be anything on there that helps me
i suppose i could try setting my harddrive to ide, but i dont know how to set acpi=off, and apparently that isn't really a fix anyway
but i really want to try ubuntu!
i tried using the latest alpha of 8.04 too, and that started throwing errors at me
i just wanted to see if the issues with my chipset were fixed
in the options change sata settings from ide to raid
I am using a p35 chipset
I know it is, but the raid controller is suppported and will work without raid setup
took me 2 hours to figure it out :p
was like while will windows install but linux won't
I couldn't get a hard drive detected if that was your issue
anyway on commandline in the directory its wine msiexec /i steam.msi
